function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lower-income population residing in low-rent areas","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread due to crowded living conditions and potential lack of health insurance","Mitigation":"Provide accessible healthcare services and improve living conditions in low-rent areas","Technologies":"Healthcare facilities, urban planning, housing infrastructure improvements","People":"Low-income residents","Owner":"Local government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Large households with lower urban density and limited transportation alternatives","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread due to longer commute times and limited access to alternative transportation","Mitigation":"Enhance public transportation services and improve accessibility to alternative transportation modes","Technologies":"Public transportation infrastructure, urban planning, alternative transportation options","People":"Residents of large households","Owner":"Local government, transportation authorities"},{"Description":"Crowded houses accommodating younger, lower-income people with little to no health insurance","Impact":"Higher susceptibility to contagious diseases due to overcrowding and lack of healthcare coverage","Mitigation":"Expand access to health insurance and improve housing conditions for vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Health insurance programs, housing infrastructure improvements","People":"Younger, lower-income individuals","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, housing authorities"}]}
